title: Pushing A Brussels Sprout Up A Mountain â€” For A Cause
teaser: Stuart Kettell also has stalked a town on stilts and run in a human-sized hamster wheel to support cancer patients. His stunts have raised nearly $70,000. He's pushing this sprout with his nose.
